name: UnStable Reactor (Nejcraft)
description:
Have you ever wondered what comes to running a powerplant? Looks like just one technician and that happens to be you. Good luck.

Every now and then something breaks(and you can hear an iconic sound almost everyone knows) and now its your job to find where and what broke(cameras are your friends).

PS: The book should have had tutorial, it doesnt, yeye, TIME.

If you want to play something good, don't play this, this was done in almost 3 days, take a look maybe there, we are working for well over an year on this now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1627770/The_Kostka/ and don't forget to WISHLIST.
